name: Faeria
summary: With its unique living board, Faeria is also the only card game where you can gain all 300 cards in less than 50 hours.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Card game
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2017年3月8日
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/397060/Faeria/
  • 开发: Abrakam SA
  • 发行: Versus Evil
